軥字的基本解释

軥
qú
车轭两边下伸反曲以夹牲头的部分：“射两軥而还。”

軥字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qú］［gōu］
［《廣韻》其俱切，平虞，羣。］
［《廣韻》古侯切，平侯，見。］
(1)车轭两边下伸反曲夹贴马颈的部分。
(2)见“軥輈”。
[②]［jū］
［《篇海》斤於切］
见“軥2録”。

軥字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【車字部】　軥； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页1241第13
【廣韻】其俱切【集韻】【韻會】權俱切，?音衢。【說文】軛下曲者。【韻會】車軛兩邊叉馬頸者。【左傳·襄十四年】射兩軥而還。【註】車軛下卷者。　又【廣韻】古侯切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】居侯切，?音鉤。【廣韻】車軥心木。　又夏后氏之輅曰軥。通作鉤。【釋名】鉤車以行爲陣，鉤股曲直有正，夏所制也。　又【廣韻】【正韻】古?切【集韻】【韻會】居?切，?音遘。【廣韻】軥槅，輓車也。　又【等韻】公?切，音苟。【前漢·朱家傳】乗不過軥牛。【註】軥，軥枙也。軥牛，小牛也。

軥字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
軥字的起名意思

暂无。

end of yoke
Basic explanation of words
end of yoke
qú
The part of the yoke stretched down and curved to clamp the head of the animal: "Shoot two tails and return."
end of yoke
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qú］［gōu］
["Guangyun" all cut, Pingyu, group. ]
["Guangyun" Ancient Houqie, Pinghou, see you. ]
(1) On both sides of the yoke, the part of the recurve clamp attached to the neck of the horse is extended downward.
(2) See "Finger".
[②]［jū］
["Pianhai" is too heavy to cut]
See "Take 2 Records".
end of yoke

[Guang Yun] Its all cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] The right all cut,? Yin Qu. [Speaking text] Those who yoke down. [Rhyme Club] Those who cross the yoke on both sides of the horse's neck. [Zuo Zhuan·Xiang Fourteen Years] Shooting two twins and returning. [Note] Those who roll down the yoke.　[Guangyun] Guhouqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] [Zhengyun] Juhouqie, sound hook. [Guang Yun] Che Yu Xinmu.　After the Xiahou clan, it is called the tail. Pass as a hook. [Release name] The hook car is in a line of behavior, the hook is straight and upright, and the summer school is also used.　 [Guang Yun] [Zheng Yun] Ancient? Cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Inhabit? Cut,? Yin Shu. 【Guang Yun】Take a car, and a car.　[Waiting Yun] Gong? Cut, Yin Gou. [Previous Han·Zhu Family Biography] Can't ride a cow. [Note] Xing, Xing also. The cow and the calf too.
